extension.summary: Install Add-ons, Plugins, Games and Programs from OpenELEC.tv
extension.description: Download and install Add-ons, Plugins, Games and Programs from the Official OpenELEC.tv addon repository.[CR] By using the official Repository you will be able to take advantage of our extensive file mirror service to help get you faster downloads from a region close to you.[CR] All addons on this repository have under gone basic testing, if you find a broken or not working addon please report it to OpenELEC.tv so we can take any action needed.
